author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.
Academic technologist and pedagogic outfitter. WordPressing since 2010. Themes, plugins, security, tweaks

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of June 7, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins There are thirteen issues this week, with five unfixed.  The most critical this week is an Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability in Crelly Slider, discovered by NinTechNet. View this...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

There are thirteen issues this week, with five unfixed.  The most critical this week is an Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability in Crelly Slider, discovered by NinTechNet.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.
